titles.title: To amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to enable farmers and ranchers to obtain farm ownership loans for the purpose of refinancing loans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development and Research.

committee.subcommittee: Conservation, Credit, Rural Development, and Research
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 5/3/2001--Introduced. Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to permit the use of farm ownership loans to refinance loans.
